messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Sanada Yukimura(ooooppppssss!!!)
messages.msgSnippet: OOOOOOPPPPPSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!BIG MISTAKE!!!!!Must review the books on the Sengoku period!!!!!! Please excuse me and thank you for correcting me!!!!
messages.messageBody:
OOOOOOPPPPPSSSSSSSSSSSS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!BIG MISTAKE!!!!!Must review the books on the Sengoku period!!!!!!

Please excuse me and thank you for correcting me!!!!
Thank you Tony.

Edy

"Anthony J. Bryant" <ajbryant@...> wrote:
Edward Alexander wrote:

> About the siege of Osaka castle in 1614-1615 I dunno much but about Sanada
> Yukimura I know some.He was one of the great generals of the Takeda clan and
> served Shingen and Katsuyori.After that he joined Tokugawa or Oda.

That would have been hard to do, as Shingen died in 1573 when Yukimura was only
two years old. He served under Hideyoshi.

I think you're going to need to start beginning your posts not with "I know" but
"I think."

Tony
--

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Sanada Yukimura
messages.msgSnippet: About the siege of Osaka castle in 1614-1615 I dunno much but about Sanada Yukimura I know some.He was one of the great generals of the Takeda clan and served
messages.messageBody:
About the siege of Osaka castle in 1614-1615 I dunno much but about Sanada Yukimura I know some.He was one of the great generals of the Takeda clan and served Shingen and Katsuyori.After that he joined Tokugawa or Oda.

Edy


jacob gerhard <madbearscave@...> wrote:Hey all! Its me again.

Could anyone help me with info on the famous Sanada
Yukimura and the Siege of Osaka Castle 1614-1615. Im
looking for noted commanders and samurai from both
sides(Toyotomi and Tokugawa). Along with any
descriptions of battles like the Battle of Tennoji.

Thanks again!

Jake

messages.subject: Sanada Yukimura
messages.msgSnippet: Hey all! Its me again. Could anyone help me with info on the famous Sanada Yukimura and the Siege of Osaka Castle 1614-1615. Im looking for noted commanders
messages.messageBody:
Hey all! Its me again.

Could anyone help me with info on the famous Sanada
Yukimura and the Siege of Osaka Castle 1614-1615. Im
looking for noted commanders and samurai from both
sides(Toyotomi and Tokugawa). Along with any
descriptions of battles like the Battle of Tennoji.

Thanks again!

Jake
